note.para: If a log message contains the same key multiple times (for example, key1=value1, key2=value2, key1=value3, key3=value4, key1=value5), then &abbrev; stores only the last (rightmost) value for the key. Using the previous example, &abbrev; will store the following pairs: key1=value5, key2=value2, key3=value4.
